sidebar.para: Ceph is an open source, scalable, software-defined storage (SDS) platform that provides block and object storage with unified management.
The &kw-hos-phrase; Ceph storage solution provides an unified, scalable, and stable storage solution for the management of the &kw-hos; volume storage (Cinder persistent volumes) service.
For more information about installation, configuration, and integration between &kw-hos-phrase; and Ceph Firefly 0.80.7 running on the hlinux kernel 3.14.44-1, see .
